title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not explain that Mutant 1 can use methionine when it is present in the medium, but Mutant 1 cannot synthesize methionine.
The response explains that Mutant 1 can use methionine when it is present in the medium, but Mutant 1 cannot synthesize methionine.
